quoteText: We retain the personal information we receive as described in this Privacy Policy for as long as you use our Services or as necessary to fulfill the purpose(s) for which it was collected, provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws.
title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

tosdr.case: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
